text: satyavisvasikale, ninnalkkentuparri ? allahuvinre margattil (dharm'masamarattinnâ€Œ) ninnal irannippurappett kealluka. enn ninnaleat parayappettal ninnal bhumiyilekk tunnikkalayunnu! paraleakattin pakaram ihaleakajivitam keant ninnal trptippettirikkukayanea ? ennal paraleakattinre mumpil ihaleakattile sukhanubhavam tuccham matramakunnu
